issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
This Jira is not meant to be contributed back, but I'm using it as a way to run unit tests against a patch file.
Specifically, TestBeelineWithArgs, ProxyAuthTest, and TestSchemaTool

Remove beeline -n flag used for impersonation.
fields.summary: Custom Hive Patch - Remove beeline -n flag in Hive 0.13.1

comments.body:
